title: Reason in Disguise
lyrics:
Cold burns with your father
Find stress in your mother
Closed eyes to be near you
Dark skies thinking bout you
Yooooou

You

Yooouu

They think of you

Yooooou

They miss you

They want you



There's always a reason in disguise

Wish it was all just some kind of lie

There's always a reason in disguise

Oh I never know why we go through it all



Something kinda odd has happened here

Saw you once but now you’ve disappeared

Where’d you go? Why you saying that you wouldn’t cry for me?

Well I’ve got enough tears for two



There's always a reason in disguise

Wish it was all just some kind of lie

There's always a reason in disguise

Oh I never know why we go through it all



Never

Never know why we go through it all

Let me tell now



There's always a reason in disguise

Wish it was all just some kind of lie

There's always a reason in disguise

Oh I never know why we go through it all

No I never know
